com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.nbt

Class CommonTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.wrappers.BasicWrapper
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.nbt.CommonTag
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommonTagCompound, CommonTagList

    public class CommonTag
extends BasicWrapper
    An NBT Tag wrapper implementation to safely operate on tags

    Data represents actual data stored by the tag. This can be:
    List, Map, byte, short, int, long, float, double, byte[], int[], String
